name: Pulse of the Poltergeist
description:
A rhythm ritual ghost hunting game! 

Arrow keys to move Priest!

J, K, L, : keys to hit the notes in ritual!

Music Credits: 

Sonata Pathetique 3rd- Beethoven

Csikos Post

Both arranged by:  Goza's Piano Channel

Here is our awesome team!

Sprite Artist: Eileen Lingad 

Game Design and Animation: Gerardo Tioseco

UI Prop and Environment Artist: Marc Fasulo
